abstract.t: This document describes a general and flexible TLV (type-length-valuestructure) for representing cryptographic signatures as well astimestamps, using the generalized MANET packet/message format[RFC5444]. It defines two Packet TLVs, two Message TLVs, and twoAddress Block TLVs, for affixing cryptographic signatures andtimestamps to a packet, message and address, respectively.
